players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
You: "Charlie, watch out as I'm the detective. Be cautious."
Charlie: "I know Alice is the detective. Stay alert, tonight's my turn to investigate."
Diana: "Alice, thanks for the warning. Stay safe tonight."
Diana: "Will keep an eye on Charlie, thanks Alice. Stay safe!"
Charlie: "Alice, keep an eye on Diana. I'll watch out for you."
You: "Will protect Diana, stay vigilant Charlie. Investigate wisely."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice
Diana was arrested
